Name: Mary Makes It Easy
Title: Scrap Cooking
Desc: Making Parmesan corn chowder, twice baked potato casserole and cinnamon oat pancakes with scraps.
LongDescription: To reduce food waste, Mary Berg shares how to use compost castoffs in recipes; using flavorful scraps like corn cobs and potato peels, Mary makes Parmesan corn chowder, twice baked potato casserole and cinnamon oat pancakes.
